biography: ​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  Patrick Timsit is a French comedian, writer and film director. He has been nominated for 4 César Awards, three times as an actor and once as a writer. He is most well known for the French comedy Un indien dans la ville. name: Patrick Timsit
